name: Hardest Grab Bag 5 Trivia Quiz | Mixed 10 Questions | 10 Questions

questions.text: How many stars does a major general have?
questions.explanation:
2.

	A lieutenant general has 3, general has 4 and a brigadier general has 1.

questions.text: Which of the following was not a Blondie movie?
questions.explanation:
Blondie's Revenge.

	'Brings Up Baby' was in 1939, 'Lucky Day' was in 1946 and 'Hero' was in 1950.

questions.text: Which was not a Clint Eastwood movie?
options: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

questions.text: Which of the following was not a nickname for a gangster?
questions.explanation:
Tiger.

	Scarface was Al Capone, Mad Dog was Vincent Coll and Pretty Boy was Charles Floyd.

questions.text: Who did not appear in 'It's A Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World'?
Who was not one of the 'Magnificent Seven'?
questions.explanation:
Robert Stack.

	Yul Brynner played Cris, Steve McQueen played Vin and Charles Bronson played Bernardo.

questions.text: Which of the following presidents was not born in Virginia?
questions.explanation:
Fillmore.

	Fillmore was born in New York.

questions.text: Which of the following game shows was not hosted by Bill Cullen?
questions.explanation:
High Rollers.

	High Rollers was hosted by Alex Trebek and Wink Martindale.

questions.text: Which is not one of the scout laws?
questions.explanation:
Honesty.

	There are twelve, the other nine being obedient, courteous, friendly, trustworthy, loyal, helpful, kind, cheerful and reverent.

questions.text: One of these was not a Judy Garland and Mickey Rooney movie. Which one?
questions.explanation:
Meet Me In St. Louis

	Starred Judy along with Margaret O'Brien, Tom Drake and June Lockhart among others.
